keyFeatures.desc-1: Song management with features like upload, play, favorites, and playlists.
keyFeatures.desc-2: Integration of Stripe for recurring payments and cancellation.
keyFeatures.desc-3: Handling of databases using Supabase and PostgreSQL.
keyFeatures.desc-4: Design of sleek UI with Tailwind, including animations and responsiveness.
keyFeatures.desc-5: Implementation of authentication with credentials and GitHub, ensuring secure user registration and login processes.
keyFeatures.desc-6: The server-side routes and handlers for POST, GET, and DELETE requests.
keyFeatures.desc-7: Real-time data fetching and management of component relations without APIs.

webDevToolkits.supabase-desc: Handling database operations and implementing authentication with credentials and GitHub.
webDevToolkits.stripe-desc: Managing recurring payments and cancellation for subscriptions.
webDevToolkits.zustand-desc: Simplifying global state management in React applications with a minimalistic API.
